named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_EMAILS_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT email FROM com.mpower.domain.Email email WHERE email.person.id = :personId AND email.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY email.activationStatus, email.createDate

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_EMAILS_BY_PERSON_ID_ORDER_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT email FROM com.mpower.domain.Email email WHERE email.person.id = :personId AND email.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY email.emailType, email.activationStatus

named-query.name: SET_EXPIRED_TEMPORARY_EMAILS_INACTIVE
named-query.query: UPDATE com.mpower.domain.Email email SET email.inactive = TRUE WHERE email.activationStatus = 'temporary' AND email.inactive = FALSE AND email.temporaryEndDate <= CURRENT_DATE
